moves.1... b6 2. c4 Bb7: He decides to fianchetto his bishop.
moves.3. Nc3 e6 4. Nf3 Be7 5. e3: here i first should have gotten my dsb out.
moves.7... O-O 8. O-O Bd6: not sure what he was after with this move.

moves.17... d6: And it was good to do so

moves.19... Qc8 20. Bxd6: collecting a free pawn and also adding support to my rook

moves.22... Qh5 23. a3: Here knight is kind of stranded, only square for it not to be taken is a6

moves.28. Rxe8 Rxe8: seemingly pinning my knight to my queen.

moves.30... Kh7 31. Rxe8: there's no defending of the mate here, but it annoys me that everyone always resigns. Maybe someday i get to finish my combination in to a checkmate. Thanks for checking the annotation out.
